articles.title: Stocks to watch: L&T, Nestle, TechM, REL, Bikaji Foods, Syngene International - Mint
articles.description: Here are a few stocks likely to be in focus on Thursday, 25 July:
articles.content: Larsen and Toubro: L&T reported a 12% YoY increase in its consolidated net profit, reaching 2,786 crore for Q1 ending June 30, 2024. Despite the geopolitical situation, the company achieved stead… [+8820 chars]
